text: Steve Strange (born Stephen John Harrington, 28 May 1959 â€“ 12 February 2015) was a Welsh pop singer. He was born in Newbridge, Caerphilly. He was best known as the lead singer and frontman of the 1980s pop group Visage. From the late 1970s he was also a very well known nightclub host and promoter. He died of a heart attack in Sharm-el-Sheikh, Egypt. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Disease-related deaths in Egypt Category:Welsh pop singers Category:New wave singers
title: Steve Strange
